structure.unit: LEVEES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION OF LANDS

law.catch_line: Board may elect for county to be subject to provisions of KRS 267.390(3)(b) and 267.490.
law.text: The board of drainage commissioners of any county, regardless of the number of drainage districts contained therein, may by resolution of the said board certified to the county judge/executive, elect for such county to be subject to the provisions of KRS 267.390(3)(b) and 267.490.
law.history: Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 235, sec. 1, effective May 18, 1956.
